criticalSuccess.message: Choose two of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Valerie has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Valerie’s personal biases, one of Valerie’s resistances, or one of Valerie’s weaknesses. you can choose the same option twice to learn two pieces of information from the same category.

success.message: Choose one of the following: You learn which skill that can Influence Valerie has the lowest DC (skipping any skills that you already know), one of Valerie’s personal biases, one of Valerie’s resistances, or one of Valerie’s weaknesses.

criticalFailure.message: Choose a piece of information to learn about, as success, but the information is incorrect. For instance, you might think Valerie is susceptible to flattery when actually Valerie is resistant to flattery.
